description.zh: whiteboard 是一个基于 Node.js 的轻量级协作绘图和草图工具，支持实时多人协同。它提供远程用户光标显示、每个用户的撤销/重做功能，并兼容 PC、平板和移动设备。用户可拖放或复制粘贴图片与 PDF，添加文本和便签，并将白板保存为图像或 JSON 文件。
description.en: whiteboard is a lightweight Node.js-based collaborative drawing and sketching application that enables real-time teamwork. It supports multi-user interaction with features like shared cursors, undo/redo per user, and cross-device compatibility. The tool allows importing images and PDFs, text input, sticky notes, and saving boards as images or JSON.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 轻量高效，易于自托管，适合实时协作场景
- 可通过配置文件和源码完全自定义
- 支持跨平台使用，涵盖桌面、平板和手机设备

## 功能列表:

- 实时显示其他用户的绘制光标
- 每个用户独立的撤销与重做功能
- 支持拖拽或复制粘贴导入图片和 PDF 文件
- 可对图像进行缩放、移动、旋转并绘制到画布或设为背景
- 支持添加文本和便签注释
- 可将白板保存为图片（如 PNG）或 JSON 格式
- 绘制线条或矩形时按住 Shift 键可绘制直角线或正方形
- 显示参与协作中最小屏幕尺寸的提示标识
- 所有操作均支持键盘快捷键
- 提供 REST API 用于外部系统集成与自动化控制
- 支持 WebDAV 协议，可直接保存至 Nextcloud 或 ownCloud
- 支持通过 YAML 配置文件调整性能与安全设置
- 可选访问令牌（AccessToken）增强安全性
- 支持通过 URL 参数设置白板 ID、用户名、标题等
- 支持从已有白板复制内容
- 提供 Nginx 和 Apache 反向代理配置示例
- 支持 Nextcloud 外部站点集成，并可自定义图标
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Lightweight and easy to self-host for real-time collaboration
- Fully customizable via configuration files and open-source code
- Cross-platform support including PC, tablet, and mobile devices

## Features:

- Real-time display of remote user cursors during drawing
- Per-user undo and redo functionality
- Drag-and-drop or copy-paste import of images and PDFs
- Resize, move, rotate, and draw images on canvas or as background
- Text and sticky note annotations
- Save whiteboard as image (e.g., PNG) or JSON for backup and sharing
- Draw straight lines and squares using Shift key assistance
- Screen size indicator showing the smallest participant's viewport
- Full keyboard shortcut support for all functions
- REST API for external integration and automation
- WebDAV support for direct saving to Nextcloud or ownCloud
- Configurable via YAML file for performance and security settings
- Optional access token authentication for enhanced security
- URL parameters to set whiteboard ID, username, title, and more
- Ability to clone content from existing whiteboards
- Reverse proxy ready (Nginx and Apache configurations provided)
- Nextcloud integration with external site linking and icon support
